content.webTitle: First Book Award podcast: Catherine O'Flynn

fields.headline: First Book Award podcast: Catherine O'Flynn
fields.bodyText: Catherine O'Flynn talks to the Guardian's literary editor, Claire Armitstead, about finding a publisher, writing in a child's voice and drawing on her own experience of working in a shopping mall in her debut novel, What Was Lost. • Click here to listen now on your computer (12 min 55 sec) • Subscribe to the Guardian Books podcast feed here, or here (via iTunes) • More about the Guardian Books podcast
